weaknesses: accessibility: Touch targets for settings and upload buttons are too small (appear to be ~32x32px)
color & contrast: Gray lyrics text (#6B7280) on dark background fails WCAG AA contrast ratio (approximately 3.2:1)
visual hierarchy: Chord symbols (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) compete visually with lyrics due to bright orange color
typography: Inconsistent text sizing - song title 'Yesterday' appears same size as artist name
spacing & layout: Excessive vertical spacing between chord symbols and lyrics creates disconnected feeling
